parameters.name: horizontalScaleFactor
parameters.shortdesc: The horizontal scale factor of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: verticalScaleFactor
parameters.shortdesc: The vertical scale factor of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: clockwiseShearAngle
parameters.shortdesc: The shear angle of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: counterclockwiseRotationAngle
parameters.shortdesc: The rotation angle of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: horizontalTranslation
parameters.shortdesc: The horizontal translation of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: verticalTranslation
parameters.shortdesc: The vertical translation of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: matrixValues
parameters.shortdesc: The values of the transformation matrix

parameters.name: matrixMapping
parameters.shortdesc: The mapping the transformation matrix performs on the unit triangle. Can accept: Array of Array of 2 Arrays of 2 Reals.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TransformationMatrix

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TransformationMatrix.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TransformationMatrices within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TransformationMatrix, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TransformationMatrix, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TransformationMatrix, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TransformationMatrix, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TransformationMatrix in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TransformationMatrix in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TransformationMatrix in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TransformationMatrix with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TransformationMatrix that follows the desired TransformationMatrix.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TransformationMatrix whose index follows the specified TransformationMatrix in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TransformationMatrix whose index comes before the desired TransformationMatrix.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TransformationMatrix in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TransformationMatrix in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TransformationMatrix.
Returns the TransformationMatrix with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
